effect.sun_moon: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.

short_effect.sun_moon: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.
